item.description:
Hi folks,

Join us for a friendly walk in the crisp October air, at a great park just outside of New Haven County!

LOCATION: This Meetup will take place at Chatfield Hollow, which is a state park located in Killingworth, CT.

PLAN: We will make a loop through the woods as well as walk on the road for a bit, to catch sites such as a covered bridge and an old water wheel.

WHEN AND WHERE: Meet at the outer parking area between 8:55 and 9:00; begin walking by 9:05.

WEAR: Hiking or other sturdy shoes with treads; layers.

DIRECTIONS: From I-95: take Exit 63, and follow Route 81 north to Route 80 west. Drive about 1.2 miles west on Route 80 and look for park entrance on your right (it comes up quick). Google map / Directions to park

PARKING NOTE: We should all be able to park in the outer parking area (visible from the road), and walk in together.

Chatfield Hollow State Park

TRAIL MAPS may be available at the entrance, or you can print one out from the park website.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet Matt in the outer parking lot

group.name: New Haven Walks in the Woods

item.name: New Haven Walks' Chatfield Hollow Meetup
